32 namespace bitpit{
46 VTK::VTK(){
47 
48  m_procs = 1;
49  m_rank = 0;
50 
51  m_headerType = "UInt32" ;
52 
53  m_fh.setDirectory( "." ) ;
54  m_fh.setSeries( false ) ;
55  m_fh.setParallel( false ) ;
56 
57  m_geomCodex = VTKFormat::APPENDED ;
58  m_dataCodex = VTKFormat::APPENDED ;
59 
60  m_cells = 0;
61  m_points= 0;
62 
63 }

70 VTK::VTK(const std::string &dir, const std::string &name ):
71  VTK(){
72 
73  setNames(dir, name) ;
74 
75 }

81 void VTK::setHeaderType(const std::string &st){
82 
83  if( st == "UInt32" || st == "UInt64"){
84  m_headerType = st ;
85  }
86 
87  else{
88  log::cout() << "Unsupported HeaderType " << st << std::endl ;
89  }
90 
91 }
92 
97 const std::string & VTK::getHeaderType( ) const{
98  return m_headerType ;
99 }

155 void VTK::setCounter( int counter){
156 
157  m_fh.setSeries(true) ;
158  m_fh.setCounter(counter) ;
159 
160 }
161 
166 int VTK::unsetCounter( ){
167 
168  int counter = m_fh.getCounter() ;
169  m_fh.setSeries(false) ;
170 
171  return counter;
172 }

179 
180  return m_fh.getCounter( ) ;
181 
182 }

189 void VTK::setParallel( uint16_t procs, uint16_t rank){
190 
191  if( procs < 1 ) log::cout() << " Numer of processes must be greater than 0" << std::endl ;
192  if( rank >= procs) log::cout() << " m_rankess is not in valid range " << std::endl ;
193 
194  m_procs = procs;
195  m_rank = rank;
196 
197  if(m_procs == 0) {
198  m_fh.setParallel(false) ;
199  }
200 
201  else {
202  m_fh.setParallel(true) ;
203  m_fh.setBlock( rank ) ;
204  }
205 
206 }
207 
212 void VTK::setCodex( VTKFormat cod) {
213 
214  setGeomCodex( cod) ;
215  setDataCodex( cod) ;
216 
217 }
218 
223 void VTK::setGeomCodex( VTKFormat cod ) {
224 
225  m_geomCodex = cod ;
226  for( auto &field : m_geometry)
227  field.setCodification( cod ) ;
228 
229 }
230 
235 void VTK::setDataCodex( VTKFormat cod ) {
236 
237  m_dataCodex = cod ;
238  for( auto &field : m_data)
239  field.setCodification( cod ) ;
240 
241 }
242 
247 void VTK::setGeomData( VTKField &&field ){
248 
249  const std::string &name = field.getName();
250  int id = _findFieldIndex( name, m_geometry ) ;
251  if( id < 0 ){
252  throw std::runtime_error("Not admissible to add geometry field with same name as user data " + name );
253  }
254 
255  m_geometry[id] = std::move(field);
256 
257 }
258 
265 VTKField& VTK::addData( VTKField &&field ){
266 
267  const std::string &name = field.getName();
268  if( findGeomData(name) ){
269  throw std::runtime_error("Not admissible to add user data with same name as geometry field " + name );
270  }
271 
272  int id = _findFieldIndex( name, m_data ) ;
273  if (id >= 0) {
274  m_data[id] = std::move(field);
275  } else {
276  id = m_data.size();
277  m_data.push_back(std::move(field));
278  }
279 
280  return m_data[id] ;
281 
282 }
283 
291 VTKField& VTK::addData( const std::string &name, VTKBaseStreamer* streamer ){
292 
293  if( findGeomData(name) ){
294  throw std::runtime_error("Not admissible to add user data with same name as geometry field " + name);
295  }
296 
297  VTKField *ptr = _findData( name ) ;
298  if ( ! ptr ) {
299  m_data.push_back( VTKField( name ) ) ;
300  ptr = &(m_data.back()) ;
301  }
302 
303  ptr->setCodification(m_dataCodex) ;
304  ptr->setStreamer(*streamer) ;
305 
306  return *ptr ;
307 
308 }
309 
314 void VTK::removeData( const std::string &name ){
315 
316  std::vector<VTKField>::iterator fieldItr = m_data.begin();
317 
318  while( fieldItr != m_data.end()){
319 
320  if( fieldItr->getName() == name){
321  fieldItr = m_data.erase(fieldItr);
322  return;
323  } else {
324  ++fieldItr;
325  }
326  }
327 
328  log::cout() << "did not find field for removing in VTK: " << name << std::endl;
329 
330 }
331 
336 void VTK::enableData( const std::string &name ){
337 
338  VTKField *field = _findData(name);
339 
340  if( field ) {
341  field->enable() ;
342 
343  } else{
344  log::cout() << "did not find field for enabling: " << name << std::endl;
345  }
346 
347 
348 }
349 
354 void VTK::disableData( const std::string &name ){
355 
356  VTKField *field = _findData(name);
357 
358  if( field ) {
359  field->disable() ;
360 
361  } else{
362  log::cout() << "did not find field for disabling: " << name << std::endl;
363  }
364 
365 }

371 std::vector<std::string> VTK::getFieldNames( const std::vector<VTKField> &fields ) const {
372 
373  std::size_t nFields = fields.size();
374  std::vector<std::string> names(nFields);
375  for (std::size_t i = 0; i < nFields; ++i) {
376  names[i] = fields[i].getName();
377  }
378 
379  return names;
380 }

442 const VTKField * VTK::findData( const std::string &name ) const {
443 
444  int id = _findFieldIndex(name, m_data) ;
445  if (id >= 0) {
446  return getData(id);
447  } else {
448  return nullptr;
449  }
450 }

458 VTKField * VTK::_findData( const std::string &name ) {
459 
460  int id = _findFieldIndex(name, m_data) ;
461  if (id >= 0) {
462  return getData(id);
463  } else {
464  return nullptr;
465  }
466 }

474 const VTKField * VTK::findGeomData( const std::string &name ) const {
475 
476  int id = _findFieldIndex(name, m_geometry) ;
477  if (id >= 0) {
478  return getGeomData(id);
479  } else {
480  return nullptr;
481  }
482 }

490 VTKField * VTK::_findGeomData( const std::string &name ) {
491 
492  int id = _findFieldIndex(name, m_geometry) ;
493  if (id >= 0) {
494  return getGeomData(id);
495  } else {
496  return nullptr;
497  }
498 }

505 const VTKField * VTK::getData( std::size_t id ) const {
506 
507  assert(id < m_data.size());
508 
509  return m_data.data() + id;
510 }

518 
519  assert(id < m_data.size());
520 
521  return m_data.data() + id;
522 }

531  assert(id < m_geometry.size());

533  return m_geometry.data() + id;

541 VTKField * VTK::getGeomData( std::size_t id ) {
542 
543  assert(id < m_geometry.size());
544 
545  return m_geometry.data() + id;
546 }
547 
556 int VTK::_findFieldIndex( const std::string &name, const std::vector<VTKField> &fields ) const {
557 
558  for( std::size_t i = 0; i < fields.size(); ++i ) {
559  if( fields[i].getName() == name ){
560  return i ;
561  }
562  }
563 
564  return -1 ;
565 }
566 
571 void VTK::calcAppendedOffsets(){
572 
573  uint64_t offset(0) ;
574  uint64_t HeaderByte(0) ;
575 
576  if( getHeaderType() == "UInt32"){
577  HeaderByte = sizeof(uint32_t) ;
578  }
579 
580  else if( getHeaderType() == "UInt64") {
581  HeaderByte = sizeof(uint64_t) ;
582  }
583 
584  for( auto & field : m_data ){
585  if( field.isEnabled() && field.getCodification() == VTKFormat::APPENDED && field.getLocation() == VTKLocation::POINT ) {
586  field.setOffset( offset) ;
587  offset += HeaderByte + calcFieldSize(field) ;
588  }
589  }
590 
591  for( auto & field : m_data ){
592  if( field.isEnabled() && field.getCodification() == VTKFormat::APPENDED && field.getLocation() == VTKLocation::CELL) {
593  field.setOffset( offset) ;
594  offset += HeaderByte + calcFieldSize(field) ;
595  }
596  }
597 
598  for( auto & field : m_geometry ){
599  if( field.isEnabled() && field.getCodification() == VTKFormat::APPENDED ) {
600  field.setOffset( offset) ;
601  offset += HeaderByte + calcFieldSize(field) ;
602  }
603  }
604 
605 }
606 
611 void VTK::checkAllFields(){
612 
613  for( auto & field : m_data ){
614  if( field.isEnabled() && !field.hasAllMetaData() ) {
615  field.disable() ;
616 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_DEBUG
617  log::cout() << "Data field " << field.getName() << " has not all metadata and has been disabled from reading/writing in VTK" << std::endl ;
618 #endif
619  }
620  }
621 
622  for( auto & field : m_geometry ){
623  if( field.isEnabled() && !field.hasAllMetaData() ) {
624  field.disable() ;
625 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_DEBUG
626  log::cout() << "Geometry field " << field.getName() << " has not all metadata and has been disabled from reading/writing in VTK" << std::endl ;
627 #endif
628  }
629  }
630 
631 }
632 
639 void VTK::write( VTKWriteMode writeMode ){
640 
641  int counter(0);
642 
643  if( writeMode == VTKWriteMode::NO_SERIES ){
644  counter = unsetCounter() ;
645  }
646 
647  if( writeMode == VTKWriteMode::NO_INCREMENT ){
648  counter = getCounter() -1 ;
649  setCounter( counter) ;
650  }
651 
652  checkAllFields() ;
653  calcAppendedOffsets() ;
654 
655  writeMetaInformation() ;
656  writeData() ;
657 
658  if( m_procs > 1 && m_rank == 0) writeCollection() ;
659 
660  if( writeMode == VTKWriteMode::DEFAULT || writeMode == VTKWriteMode::NO_INCREMENT ){
661  m_fh.incrementCounter() ;
662  }
663 
664  if( writeMode == VTKWriteMode::NO_SERIES ){
665  setCounter(counter) ;
666  }
667 
668 }
669 
677 void VTK::write( const std::string &name, VTKWriteMode writeMode ){
678 
679  std::string oldName = getName() ;
680 
681  setName(name) ;
682  write(writeMode) ;
683  setName(oldName) ;
684 
685 }
686 
690 void VTK::writeData( ){
691 
692  std::fstream str ;
693  std::fstream::pos_type position_insert ;
694 
695  int length;
696  char* buffer ;
697 
698 
699  //We need to open the file in binary mode in order for the seekg/tellg
700  //methods to work properly. ASCII mode does not guarantee a correct
701  //stream positioning, because of automatic jump of escape characters
702  // (e.g., "\n" on Unix or "\r\n" on Windows).
703  str.open( m_fh.getPath( ), std::ios::in | std::ios::out | std::ios::binary ) ;
704  if (!str.is_open()) {
705  throw std::runtime_error("Cannot create file \"" + m_fh.getName() + "\"" + " inside the directory \"" + m_fh.getDirectory() + "\"");
706  }
707 
708  //Position the input stream at the beginning
709  str.seekg(0, std::ios::beg);
710 
711  { // Write Ascii
712  //
713  // It is fine to write ASCII on a binary opened file because the method
714  // genericIO::flushBinary is basically a reinterpret_cast of chars into
715  // chars and ensures consistent results.
716 
717  position_insert = str.tellg();
718 
719  //Writing first point data then cell data
720  for( auto &field : m_data ){
721  if( field.isEnabled() && field.getCodification() == VTKFormat::ASCII && field.getLocation() == VTKLocation::POINT ) {
722  str.seekg( position_insert);
723  readDataArray( str, field ) ;
724 
725  str.seekg( field.getPosition() ) ;
726  genericIO::copyUntilEOFInString( str, buffer, length );
727 
728  field.write( str ) ;
729  position_insert = str.tellg();
730 
731  if(position_insert==field.getPosition()){
732  log::cout() << "Error VTK: No data has been written for field " << field.getName() << std::endl;
733  assert(false);
734  }
735 
736  str << std::endl ;
737  genericIO::flushBINARY( str, buffer, length) ;
738 
739  delete [] buffer ;
740 
741  }
742  }
743 
744  for( auto &field : m_data ){
745  if( field.isEnabled() && field.getCodification() == VTKFormat::ASCII && field.getLocation() == VTKLocation::CELL ) {
746  str.seekg( position_insert);
747  readDataArray( str, field ) ;
748 
749  str.seekg( field.getPosition() ) ;
750  genericIO::copyUntilEOFInString( str, buffer, length );
751 
752  field.write( str ) ;
753  position_insert = str.tellg();
754 
755  if(position_insert==field.getPosition()){
756  log::cout() << "Error VTK: No data has been written for field " << field.getName() << std::endl;
757  assert(false);
758  }
759 
760  str << std::endl ;
761  genericIO::flushBINARY( str, buffer, length) ;
762 
763  delete [] buffer ;
764  }
765  }
766 
767  for( auto &field : m_geometry ){
768  if( field.isEnabled() && field.getCodification() == VTKFormat::ASCII ) {
769  str.seekg( position_insert);
770  readDataArray( str, field ) ;
771 
772  str.seekg( field.getPosition() ) ;
773  genericIO::copyUntilEOFInString( str, buffer, length );
774 
775  field.write( str ) ;
776  position_insert = str.tellg();
777 
778  if(position_insert==field.getPosition()){
779  log::cout() << "Error VTK: No data has been written for field " << field.getName() << std::endl;
780  assert(false);
781  }
782 
783  str << std::endl ;
784  genericIO::flushBINARY( str, buffer, length) ;
785 
786  delete [] buffer ;
787  }
788  }
789 
790  // Position the stream at the beginning of the stream
791  str.seekg(0, std::ios::beg);
792 
793  }
794 
795  { // Write Appended
796 
797  char c_;
798  std::string line ;
799  std::fstream::pos_type position_before_write ;
800 
801  //Go to the initial position of the appended section
802  while( getline(str, line) && (! bitpit::utils::string::keywordInString( line, "<AppendedData")) ){}
803 
804  str >> c_;
805  while( c_ != '_') str >> c_;
806 
807  position_insert = str.tellg();
808  genericIO::copyUntilEOFInString( str, buffer, length );
809 
810  //Writing first point data then cell data
811  for( auto &field : m_data ){
812  if( field.isEnabled() && field.getCodification() == VTKFormat::APPENDED && field.getLocation() == VTKLocation::POINT ) {
813  if( getHeaderType() == "UInt32"){
814  uint32_t nbytes = calcFieldSize(field) ;
815  genericIO::flushBINARY(str, nbytes) ;
816  }
817 
818  else{
819  uint64_t nbytes = calcFieldSize(field) ;
820  genericIO::flushBINARY(str, nbytes) ;
821  }
822 
823  position_before_write = str.tellg();
824  field.write(str) ;
825  if( (uint64_t) str.tellg()-position_before_write != calcFieldSize(field) ){
826  log::cout() << "Error VTK: Data written do not corrispond to size of field " << field.getName() << std::endl;
827  assert(false);
828  }
829  }
830  }
831 
832  for( auto &field : m_data ){
833  if( field.isEnabled() && field.getCodification() == VTKFormat::APPENDED && field.getLocation() == VTKLocation::CELL ) {
834 
835  if( getHeaderType() == "UInt32"){
836  uint32_t nbytes = calcFieldSize(field) ;
837  genericIO::flushBINARY(str, nbytes) ;
838  }
839 
840  else{
841  uint64_t nbytes = calcFieldSize(field) ;
842  genericIO::flushBINARY(str, nbytes) ;
843  }
844 
845  position_before_write = str.tellg();
846  field.write(str) ;
847  if( (uint64_t) str.tellg()-position_before_write != calcFieldSize(field) ){
848  log::cout() << "Error VTK: Data written do not corrispond to size of field " << field.getName() << std::endl;
849  assert(false);
850  }
851 
852  }
853  }
854 
855  //Writing Geometry Data
856  for( auto &field : m_geometry ){
857  if( field.isEnabled() && field.getCodification() == VTKFormat::APPENDED ) {
858  if( getHeaderType() == "UInt32"){
859  uint32_t nbytes = calcFieldSize(field) ;
860  genericIO::flushBINARY(str, nbytes) ;
861  }
862 
863  else{
864  uint64_t nbytes = calcFieldSize(field) ;
865  genericIO::flushBINARY(str, nbytes) ;
866  }
867 
868  position_before_write = str.tellg();
869  field.write(str) ;
870  if( (uint64_t) str.tellg()-position_before_write != calcFieldSize(field) ){
871  log::cout() << "Error VTK: Data written do not corrispond to size of field " << field.getName() << std::endl;
872  assert(false);
873  }
874  }
875  }
876 
877  genericIO::flushBINARY( str, buffer, length) ;
878 
879  delete [] buffer ;
880  }
881 
882  // Closing Appended Section
883  str.close();
884 
885 }
886 
892 void VTK::writeDataHeader( std::fstream &str, bool parallel ){
893 
894  VTKLocation location ;
895  std::stringstream scalars, vectors ;
896 
897  for( int j=0; j<2; j++){
898 
899  if( j==0 ) location = VTKLocation::POINT ;
900  if( j==1 ) location = VTKLocation::CELL ;
901 
902  scalars.str("");
903  vectors.str("");
904 
905  //Creating Scalar and Vector Lists
906  scalars << "\"" ;
907  vectors << "\"" ;
908 
909  for( auto &field : m_data ){
910  if( field.isEnabled() && field.getLocation() == location){
911  if( field.getFieldType() == VTKFieldType::SCALAR ) scalars << field.getName() << " " ;
912  else if( field.getFieldType() == VTKFieldType::VECTOR ) vectors << field.getName() << " " ;
913  }
914 
915  }
916 
917  scalars << "\"" ;
918  vectors << "\"" ;
919 
920  if( location == VTKLocation::POINT) {
921  str << " <" ;
922  if( parallel ) str << "P" ;
923  str << "PointData " ;
924  }
925 
926  else if( location == VTKLocation::CELL ) {
927  str << " <" ;
928  if( parallel ) str << "P" ;
929  str << "CellData " ;
930  }
931 
932  str << " Scalars=" << scalars.str()
933  << " Vectors=" << vectors.str()
934  << ">" << std::endl;
935 
936  //Writing DataArray
937  for( auto &field : m_data ){
938  if( field.isEnabled() && field.getLocation() == location && !parallel) writeDataArray( str, field ) ;
939  if( field.isEnabled() && field.getLocation() == location && parallel) writePDataArray( str, field );
940  }
941 
942  str << " </" ;
943  if( parallel ) str << "P" ;
944 
945  if( location == VTKLocation::POINT) str << "PointData> " << std::endl;
946  if( location == VTKLocation::CELL) str << "CellData> " << std::endl;
947 
948  }
949 
950 }
951 
957 void VTK::writeDataArray( std::fstream &str, VTKField &field ){
958 
959  str << vtk::convertDataArrayToString( field ) << std::endl ;
960  str << " </DataArray>" << std::endl ;
961 
962 }
963 
969 void VTK::writePDataArray( std::fstream &str, VTKField &field ){
970 
971  str << vtk::convertPDataArrayToString( field ) << std::endl ;
972  str << " </PDataArray>" << std::endl ;
973 
974 }
975 
979 void VTK::read( ){
980 
981  readMetaInformation( );
982  checkAllFields() ;
983  readData( ) ;
984 
985 }
986 
990 void VTK::readData( ){
991 
992  std::fstream str ;
993  std::fstream::pos_type position_appended;
994  std::string line;
995  char c_ ;
996  uint32_t nbytes32 ;
997  uint64_t nbytes64 ;
998 
999  str.open( m_fh.getPath( ), std::ios::in | std::ios::binary) ;
1000 
1001  //Read appended data
1002  //Go to the initial position of the appended section
1003  bool foundAppendedSection = false;
1004  while( !foundAppendedSection && getline(str, line) ){
1005  foundAppendedSection = bitpit::utils::string::keywordInString( line, "<AppendedData");
1006  }
1007 
1008  if( foundAppendedSection){
1009  str >> c_;
1010  while( c_ != '_') str >> c_;
1011 
1012  position_appended = str.tellg();
1013 
1014 
1015  //Read appended data
1016  for( auto & field : m_data){
1017  if( field.isEnabled() && field.getCodification() == VTKFormat::APPENDED){
1018  str.clear();
1019  str.seekg( position_appended) ;
1020  str.seekg( field.getOffset(), std::ios::cur) ;
1021  if( m_headerType== "UInt32") genericIO::absorbBINARY( str, nbytes32 ) ;
1022  if( m_headerType== "UInt64") genericIO::absorbBINARY( str, nbytes64 ) ;
1023 
1024 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_DEBUG
1025  std::fstream::pos_type position_before = str.tellg();
1026 #endif
1027 
1028  field.read( str, calcFieldEntries(field), calcFieldComponents(field) ) ;
1029 
1030 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_DEBUG
1031  if( uint64_t(str.tellg()-position_before) != calcFieldSize(field) ){
1032  log::cout() << "Warning VTK: Size of data read does not corrispond to size of field " << field.getName() << std::endl;
1033  log::cout() << "Found data chunk dimension of : "<< uint64_t(str.tellg()-position_before)<<" different from estimated field size : " <<calcFieldSize(field)<<std::endl;
1034  }
1035 #endif
1036 
1037  }
1038  }
1039 
1040  //Read appended m_geometry
1041  for( auto & field : m_geometry ){
1042  if( field.isEnabled() && field.getCodification() == VTKFormat::APPENDED){
1043  str.clear();
1044  str.seekg( position_appended) ;
1045  str.seekg( field.getOffset(), std::ios::cur) ;
1046  if( m_headerType== "UInt32") genericIO::absorbBINARY( str, nbytes32 ) ;
1047  if( m_headerType== "UInt64") genericIO::absorbBINARY( str, nbytes64 ) ;
1048 
1049 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_DEBUG
1050  std::fstream::pos_type position_before = str.tellg();
1051 #endif
1052 
1053  field.read( str, calcFieldEntries(field), calcFieldComponents(field) ) ;
1054 
1055 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_DEBUG
1056  if( uint64_t(str.tellg()-position_before) != calcFieldSize(field) ){
1057  log::cout() << "Warning VTK: Size of data read does not corrispond to size of field " << field.getName() << std::endl;
1058  log::cout() << "Found data chunk dimension of : "<< uint64_t(str.tellg()-position_before)<<" different from estimated field size : " <<calcFieldSize(field)<<std::endl;
1059  }
1060 #endif
1061  }
1062  }
1063 
1064  //Leave the file opened in binary mode and reposition it to the start
1065  //to allow using seekg/tellg later.
1066  str.clear();
1067  str.seekg(0, std::ios::beg) ;
1068 
1069  }
1070 
1071 
1072  //Read ascii data
1073  for( auto & field : m_data ){
1074  if( field.isEnabled() && field.getCodification() == VTKFormat::ASCII){
1075 
1076  str.clear();
1077  str.seekg( field.getPosition() ) ;
1078  field.read( str, calcFieldEntries(field), calcFieldComponents(field) ) ;
1079 
1080 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_DEBUG
1081  if(str.tellg()==field.getPosition()){
1082  log::cout() << "Warning VTK: No data have been read for field " << field.getName() << std::endl;
1083  }
1084 #endif
1085  }
1086  }
1087 
1088  //Read ascii geometry
1089  for( auto & field : m_geometry ){
1090  if( field.isEnabled() && field.getCodification() == VTKFormat::ASCII){
1091 
1092  str.clear();
1093  str.seekg( field.getPosition() ) ;
1094 
1095  field.read( str, calcFieldEntries(field), calcFieldComponents(field) ) ;
1096 
1097 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_DEBUG
1098  if(str.tellg()==field.getPosition()){
1099  log::cout() << "Warning VTK: No data have been read for field " << field.getName() << std::endl;
1100  }
1101 #endif
1102  }
1103  }
1104 
1105  str.close();
1106 
1107 }
1108 
1115 void VTK::readDataHeader( std::fstream &str ){
1116 
1117 
1118  std::fstream::pos_type pos_ ;
1119 
1120  VTKLocation location;
1121  std::string locationString ;
1122  std::string line, loc;
1123  std::stringstream ss;
1124 
1125  bool read ;
1126 
1127  VTKField temp ;
1128  VTKField* ptemp ;
1129 
1130 
1131  // Mark all fields as unused
1132  std::unordered_set<std::string> unusedFields;
1133  for (VTKField &field : m_data) {
1134  unusedFields.insert(field.getName());
1135  }
1136 
1137  // Read header
1138  for( int i=0; i<2; i++){
1139 
1140  ss.str("") ;
1141  if( i== 0) {
1142  location = VTKLocation::POINT;
1143  locationString = "Point" ;
1144  } else if( i== 1) {
1145  location = VTKLocation::CELL;
1146  locationString = "Cell" ;
1147  }
1148 
1149 
1150  temp.setLocation( location ) ;
1151 
1152  ss << "</" << locationString << "Data>" ;
1153  loc = ss.str();
1154 
1155  read= true ;
1156  if( ! getline( str, line) ) read = false ;
1157  if( bitpit::utils::string::keywordInString( line, loc) ) read=false ;
1158 
1159 
1160  while( read ){
1161  if( vtk::convertStringToDataArray( line, temp ) ) {
1162 
1163  if( temp.getCodification() == VTKFormat::ASCII) {
1164  pos_ = str.tellg() ;
1165  }
1166 
1167  else{
1168  pos_ = 0 ;
1169  }
1170 
1171  temp.setPosition( pos_ ) ;
1172 
1173  ptemp = _findData( temp.getName() );
1174  if( !ptemp ) {
1175  m_data.push_back( VTKField( temp ) ) ;
1176  }
1177 
1178  else{
1179  ptemp->setOffset( temp.getOffset() ) ;
1180  ptemp->setLocation( temp.getLocation() ) ;
1181  ptemp->setDataType( temp.getDataType() ) ;
1182  ptemp->setFieldType( temp.getFieldType() ) ;
1183  ptemp->setCodification( temp.getCodification() ) ;
1184  ptemp->setPosition( temp.getPosition() ) ;
1185 
1186  // The field should not be marked as unused
1187  if( unusedFields.count(ptemp->getName()) > 0 ){
1188  unusedFields.erase(ptemp->getName());
1189  }
1190  }
1191 
1192  }
1193 
1194  if( ! getline( str, line) ) read = false ;
1195  if( bitpit::utils::string::keywordInString( line, loc) ) read=false ;
1196  }
1197 
1198  }
1199 
1200  // Disable all unused fields
1201  for (const std::string &fieldname : unusedFields) {
1202  VTKField *field = _findData(fieldname);
1203  assert(field);
1204  field->disable();
1205  }
1206 }
1207 
1213 bool VTK::readDataArray( std::fstream &str, VTKField &field ){
1214 
1215  std::string line ;
1216 
1217  while( getline(str, line) ){
1218 
1219  if( bitpit::utils::string::keywordInString( line, field.getName() ) ){
1220  if( vtk::convertStringToDataArray( line, field ) ){
1221 
1222  if( field.getCodification() == VTKFormat::ASCII) {
1223  field.setPosition( str.tellg() ) ;
1224  }
1225 
1226  return true ;
1227  }
1228  }
1229  }
1230 
1231  return false ;
1232 
1233 }
1234 
1235 }
